key_risks: Clinical trial risks due to early-stage pipeline with no commercially available products
Regulatory hurdles and potential delays or rejections from agencies like the FDA
Dependence on external funding, with long-term financial stability uncertain
Highly competitive IBD treatment market with numerous established players
Legal investigation by Pomerantz LLP raising concerns about potential misconduct
controversies: Ongoing legal investigation by Pomerantz LLP on behalf of investors
Potential reputational damage and financial liabilities from legal issues
social_issues: Focus on addressing unmet medical needs in inflammatory bowel disease (IBD)
governance_issues: Potential governance concerns due to legal investigation and reliance on external funding
